name: Chisel
questions: A dangerous machine you were tampering with lashed out at you. What was the machine and how did it scar you?
The factory's every creation leaves behind piles of refuse. What waste do you see as useful materials that others don't?

name: Flywheel
questions: The Beast Lanes are dangerous places, and not everyone is as talented as you are. What tragedy has befallen someone who followed you there?
Your abilities have allowed you to climb to the top of the factory and see the sky. How did seeing the wider world and starry cosmos affect you?

name: Fume
questions: You've seen the worst of the Steel Trap's workers. What is the most desperate thing you've seen someone do?
You got too close to one of your informats once. What happened?

name: Grease
questions: You've made a deal with one of the overseers that went wrong. What did you have to give up to them?
A faction in your neighborhood still owes you a favor. Who are they and how did you earn it?

name: Hammer
questions: You were forced to fight a friend in the pits. Only one of you got to leave. What happened?
Which one of the overseers is nervous around you?

name: Nail
questions: You've learned the source of many folks' hopelessness. What could change their minds?
Someone you inspired to stand up to the overseers was caught. What happened to them?

name: Spark
questions: You incited an incident between workers and an overseer. It turned ugly. Who couldn't you protect?
You convinced two factions with a grudge to settle the score. How well has it turned out?

name: Vapor
questions: You were caught in the act of stealing from the overseers. Who did you throw under the bus to get out of trouble?
One of the overseers knows what you're up to, but instead of reporting you, they're using you. What do they want?
